items.name: Blink Dagger
items.lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

active.name: Blink
active.description: Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.  If damage is taken, Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds.

items.name: Blades of Attack
items.lore: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.

items.name: Broadsword
items.lore: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.

items.name: Chainmail
items.lore: A medium weave of metal chains.

items.name: Claymore
items.lore: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.

items.name: Helm of Iron Will
items.lore: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

items.name: Javelin
items.lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.

passive.name: Pierce
passive.description: Grants each attack a chance to deal bonus damage.

items.name: Mithril Hammer
items.lore: A hammer forged of pure mithril.

items.name: Platemail
items.lore: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.

items.name: Quarterstaff
items.lore: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

items.name: Quelling Blade
items.lore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.

active.name: Chop Tree/Ward
active.description: Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targetting wards.

passive.name: Quell
passive.description: Increases attack damage against non-hero units, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee. Does not provide bonus damage against Roshan.

items.name: Ring of Protection
items.lore: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

items.name: Gauntlets of Strength
items.lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.

items.name: Slippers of Agility
items.lore: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.

items.name: Mantle of Intelligence
items.lore: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.

items.name: Iron Branch
items.lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

items.name: Belt of Strength
items.lore: A valued accessory for improving vitality.

items.name: Band of Elvenskin
items.lore: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.

items.name: Robe of the Magi
items.lore: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.

items.name: Circlet
items.lore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.

items.name: Ogre Club
items.lore: You grow stronger just by holding it.

items.name: Blade of Alacrity
items.lore: A long blade imbued with time magic.

items.name: Staff of Wizardry
items.lore: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.

items.name: Ultimate Orb
items.lore: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.

items.name: Gloves of Haste
items.lore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

items.name: Morbid Mask
items.lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.
items.description: Morbid Mask is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

passive.name: Lifesteal
passive.description: Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.

items.name: Ring of Regen
items.lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

items.name: Sage's Mask
items.lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

items.name: Boots of Speed
items.lore: Fleet footwear, increasing movement.
items.description: Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

items.name: Gem of True Sight
items.lore:
Not one thrall creature of the depths,
Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep,
Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular,
Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.
items.description: Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.

passive.name: True Sight
passive.description: Adds the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within its carrier's range.

items.name: Cloak
items.lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.

items.name: Talisman of Evasion
items.lore: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.
items.description: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

items.name: Cheese
items.lore: Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.

use.description: Consume to instantly restore health and mana.

items.name: Magic Stick
items.lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

active.name: Energy Charge
active.description: Instantly restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored. Gains a charge (max 10) whenever a nearby visible enemy uses an ability.

items.name: Magic Wand
items.lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

active.name: Energy Charge
active.description: Instantly restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored. Gains a charge (max 17) whenever a nearby visible enemy uses an ability.

items.name: Ghost Scepter
items.lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.
items.description: Using a Town Portal Scroll or Boots of Travel  will not dispel Ghost Form.

active.name: Ghost Form
active.description: Enter ghost form, becoming immune to physical damage, yet unable to attack and taking 40% extra magic damage.

items.name: Clarity
items.lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

use.description: Restores mana to the target unit over time.  If the unit is attacked, the effect is lost.

items.name: Healing Salve
items.lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.

use.description: Restores health to the target unit over time.  If the unit is attacked, the effect is lost.
Reveals and slows invisible Heroes in a nearby area.

items.name: Bottle
items.lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.
items.description: Hold Control to use Regenerate on an allied hero. Stored runes cannot be shared.

use.name: Regenerate
use.description: Consumes a charge to restore Health and Mana over time. Healing stops if attacked. Bottle can be refilled at your team's fountain. Runes can be stored in the Bottle for later use, and are activated automatically after 2 minutes. If Bottle does not have full charges and is placed on a courier, the courier will move 30%% slower.

items.name: Observer Ward
items.lore: A form of half-sentient plant, often cultivated by apprentice wizards.
items.description: Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.

use.description: Plants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives vision of its surrounding area to your team. Lasts 7 minutes.

items.name: Sentry Ward
items.lore: A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.
items.description: Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.

use.description: Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within its range. Lasts 4 minutes.

items.name: Tango
items.lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.
items.description: Comes with 4 charges.  Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.

use.name: Eat a Tree or Ward
use.description: Consume a target tree or ward to gradually restore health.

items.name: Animal Courier
items.lore: Losing the courier is punishable by death.

use.name: Deploy Courier
use.description: Deploys a creature to carry items to and from your team's base.

use.name: Teleport
use.description: Teleports you to a target friendly building. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

items.name: Boots of Travel
items.lore: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.
items.description: Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

active.name: Teleport
active.description: Teleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain. Upgradable to allow you to teleport to allied heroes.

items.name: Phase Boots
items.lore: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.
items.description: Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

active.name: Phase
active.description: Gives increased movement speed and lets you move through units.  Phase is cancelled upon using another item or ability.

items.name: Demon Edge
items.lore: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.

items.name: Eaglesong
items.lore: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.

items.name: Reaver
items.lore: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.

items.name: Sacred Relic
items.lore: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.

items.name: Hyperstone
items.lore: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.

items.name: Ring of Health
items.lore: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.

items.name: Void Stone
items.lore: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.

items.name: Mystic Staff
items.lore: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.

items.name: Energy Booster
items.lore: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.

items.name: Point Booster
items.lore: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.

items.name: Vitality Booster
items.lore: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

items.name: Power Treads
items.lore: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.
items.description: Power Treads can be built using a Belt of Strength, Band of Elvenskin, or a Robe of the Magi.  Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack, nor does the attack speed bonus from multiple Power Treads.

active.name: Switch Attribute
active.description: Changes selected attribute between Strength, Agility and Intelligence.

items.name: Hand of Midas
items.lore: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.

active.name: Transmute
active.description: Kills a non-hero target for 190 gold and 2.5x experience.  Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.

items.name: Oblivion Staff
items.lore: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.

items.name: Perseverance
items.lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

items.name: Poor Man's Shield
items.lore: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.

passive.name: Damage Block
passive.description: Blocks physical attack damage based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.  Poor Man's Shield will always block attacks from enemy Heroes, but has a 53% chance to block damage from creeps.

items.name: Bracer
items.lore: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.

items.name: Wraith Band
items.lore: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.

items.name: Null Talisman
items.lore: A small gemstone attached to several chains.

items.name: Mekansm
items.lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.
items.description: Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.

active.name: Restore
active.description: Heals 250 health and gives +2 armor to allied units in a 900 radius.

passive.name: Mekansm Aura
passive.description: Grants 4 health regeneration to allied units in a 900 radius.

items.name: Vladmir's Offering
items.lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.
items.description: Multiple instances of Vladmir's Aura do not stack.

passive.name: Vladmir's Aura
passive.description: Grants lifesteal, health regeneration, mana regeneration, bonus attack damage, and armor to allies in a 900 radius.  The lifesteal percentage is based on whether the hero affected by the aura is melee or ranged.

items.name: Flying Courier
items.description:
Upgrades your team's Animal Courier to a Flying Courier, granting it swift, unobstructed movement to carry items to and from your team's base.

Requires a deployed Animal Courier.

items.name: Buckler
items.lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

active.name: Armor Bonus
active.description: Gives +2 armor to all allied units in a 900 radius.  Lasts 25 seconds on heroes, 30 seconds on units.

items.name: Ring of Basilius
items.lore: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.
items.description: Multiple instances of Basilius Aura do not stack.

active.description: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units.

items.name: Pipe of Insight
items.lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.

active.name: Barrier
active.description: Gives a shield that blocks 400 spell damage to all allies in a 900 radius.

passive.name: Insight Aura
passive.description: Gives allied units 4 health regeneration and 10% magic resistance in a 900 radius. The aura's bonus magic resistance is not applied to the equipped hero.

items.name: Urn of Shadows
items.lore: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.
items.description: Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units.  Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.

active.name: Soul Release
active.description: Heals health over time to friendly units, but deals pure damage over time to enemy units.  The healing effect is lost if the affected ally takes damage from an enemy hero or tower.

items.name: Headdress
items.lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.
items.description: Multiple instances of Regeneration Aura do not stack.

passive.name: Regeneration Aura
passive.description: Restores health to allies in a 900 unit radius.

items.name: Scythe of Vyse
items.lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

active.name: Hex
active.description: Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. Instantly destroys illusions.

items.name: Orchid Malevolence
items.lore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.

active.name: Soul Burn
active.description: Silences the target unit for 5 seconds and amplifies the damage it takes by 30%.

items.name: Eul's Scepter of Divinity
items.lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.

active.name: Cyclone
active.description: Sweeps a target unit up into cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can be cast on yourself. Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.

items.name: Force Staff
items.lore: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.

active.name: Force
active.description: Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing.  Double click to instantly cast Force on yourself.

items.name: Dagon
items.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

active.name: Energy Burst
active.description: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

items.name: Necronomicon
items.lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

active.name: Demonic Summoning
active.description: Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 40 seconds, whose strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon is upgraded. Warrior gains True Sight at level 3. Upgradable.

items.name: Aghanim's Scepter
items.lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

passive.name: Ultimate Upgrade
passive.description: Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of certain heroes.

items.name: Refresher Orb
items.lore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.

active.name: Reset Cooldowns
active.description: Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.

items.name: Assault Cuirass
items.lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.
items.description: Multiple instances of Assault Aura do not stack.

passive.name: Assault Aura
passive.description: Grants attack speed and armor to nearby allied units, and decreases the armor of nearby enemies.

items.name: Heart of Tarrasque
items.lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.

passive.name: Health Regeneration
passive.description: Restores a percentage of max health per second. If damage is taken from an enemy hero or Roshan, this ability is disabled for 5 seconds for melee heroes, or 7 seconds for ranged heroes.

items.name: Black King Bar
items.lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.

active.name: Avatar
active.description: Grants Spell Immunity and 100% Magic Damage Resistance.  Duration and cooldown decrease with each use.  Some abilities are able to disable through Avatar.

items.name: Aegis of the Immortal
items.lore: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.

passive.name: Reincarnation
passive.description: Brings you to life with full health and mana 5 seconds after you die, at the location where you died. Reincarnation must be used within 5 minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).

items.name: Shiva's Guard
items.lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.
items.description: Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.

active.name: Arctic Blast
active.description: Emits a freezing wave that deals 200 magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by -40% for 4 seconds.

passive.name: Freezing Aura
passive.description: Reduces the attack speed of all enemies in a 900 radius.

items.name: Bloodstone
items.lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

active.name: Pocket Deny
active.description: Instantly causes you to die.

passive.name: Bloodpact
passive.description: Begins with 8 charges, and gains a charge each time an enemy hero dies within 1675 range. Each charge grants 1 mana regeneration per second, reduces the gold lost from death by 25, and reduces respawn time by 4 seconds. If the bearer dies, 500 + 30 health per charge is restored to all allies within a 1675 radius, while the Bloodstone loses a third of its charges. A bloodmark is then placed where the bearer died, granting vision over a 1800 radius and allowing the bearer to gain nearby experience while dead.

items.name: Linken's Sphere
items.lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.

active.name: Transfer Spellblock
active.description: Temporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit.

items.name: Vanguard
items.lore: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.

passive.name: Damage Block
passive.description: Gives the wielder a chance to block damage from each incoming attack based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

items.name: Blade Mail
items.lore: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.

active.name: Damage Return
active.description: Reflects any damage taken back to the unit that dealt the damage.  Lasts 4.5 seconds.

items.name: Soul Booster
items.lore: Regain lost courage.

items.name: Hood of Defiance
items.lore: A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.

items.name: Divine Rapier
items.lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.
items.description: Drops on death.  Becomes unusable if picked up by an ally of its owner until it is returned to its owner. It is immediately usable by anybody if an enemy of the owner picks it up. A dropped Rapier cannot be picked up by a courier.

items.name: Monkey King Bar
items.lore: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.

passive.name: Mini-Bash
passive.description: Grants each attack a chance to deal bonus damage and deal a mini-stun.

passive.name: True Strike
passive.description: Prevents your attacks from missing. True Strike does not work when attacking enemy structures.

items.name: Radiance
items.lore: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.

active.name: Toggle Burn
active.description: When active, scorches nearby enemies for 50 damage per second and blinds them, causing them to miss 17% of their attacks.

items.name: Butterfly
items.lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.
items.description: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

active.name: Flutter
active.description: Trade evasion for 25% additional movement speed for 6 seconds.

items.name: Daedalus
items.lore: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.

passive.name: Critical Strike
passive.description: Grants each attack a chance to deal additional damage. Critical Strike does not work against buildings.

items.name: Skull Basher
items.lore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.

passive.name: Bash
passive.description: Grants each attack a chance to stun the target for 1.4 seconds and deal 60 bonus damage, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.

items.name: Battle Fury
items.lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.

active.name: Chop Tree/Ward
active.description: Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targetting wards.

passive.name: Quell
passive.description: Increases attack damage against non-hero units, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee. Does not provide bonus damage against Roshan.

passive.name: Cleave
passive.description: Deals a percent of attack damage in a 280 area around the target. Ranged units cannot Cleave.

items.name: Manta Style
items.lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.
items.description:
Melee images deal 33% damage and take 350% damage, while Ranged images deal 28% and take 400% damage.

Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.

active.name: Mirror Image
active.description: Creates 2 images of your hero that last 20 seconds. Melee heroes have a 35 second cooldown on this ability, while for Ranged heroes the cooldown is 50 seconds.

items.name: Crystalys
items.lore: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.

passive.name: Critical Strike
passive.description: Grants each attack a chance to deal additional damage. Critical Strike does not work against buildings.

items.name: Armlet of Mordiggian
items.lore: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.

active.name: Toggle Unholy Strength
active.description: When active, Unholy Strength grants +31 damage and +25 strength, but drains 40 health per second.  You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.

items.name: Shadow Blade
items.lore: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.

active.name: Shadow Walk
active.description: Makes you invisible until the duration ends, or until you attack or cast a spell.  While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units.  If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain 175 bonus damage on that attack.  Lasts 14 seconds.

items.name: Sange and Yasha
items.lore: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.
items.description: Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.

passive.name: Greater Maim
passive.description: Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 5 seconds.

items.name: Satanic
items.lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.
items.description: Satanic is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.

active.name: Unholy Rage
active.description: Increases Lifesteal percentage to 200% for 4 seconds.

passive.name: Lifesteal
passive.description: Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.

items.name: Mjollnir
items.lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.
items.description: Mjollnir is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.

active.name: Static Charge
active.description: Places a charged shield on a target unit which has a 20% chance to release a shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and 4 additional enemies.

passive.name: Chain Lightning
passive.description: Grants a chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 8 targets, dealing 150 magical damage to each.

items.name: Eye of Skadi
items.lore: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.
items.description: Eye of Skadi is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.  Eye of Skadi can be combined with Lifesteal Attack Modifiers.

passive.name: Cold Attack
passive.description: Each attack slows the movement and attack speed of the target. The duration of the slow is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

items.name: Sange
items.lore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.

passive.name: Lesser Maim
passive.description: Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 4 seconds.

items.name: Helm of the Dominator
items.lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.
items.description: Helm of the Dominator is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

active.name: Dominate
active.description: Take control of a non-hero, non-ancient target unit. Dominated units gain 500 bonus health.

passive.name: Lifesteal
passive.description: Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.

items.name: Maelstrom
items.lore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.
items.description: Maelstrom is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.

passive.name: Chain Lightning
passive.description: Grants a chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 4 targets, dealing 120 magical damage to each.

items.name: Desolator
items.lore: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.
items.description: Desolator is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

passive.name: Corruption
passive.description: Your attacks reduce target's armor for 15 seconds.

items.name: Yasha
items.lore: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.
items.description: Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.

items.name: Mask of Madness
items.lore: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.
items.description: Mask of Madness is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

active.name: Berserk
active.description: Gives 100 attack speed and 17% movement speed, but causes you to take extra 30% damage.  Lasts 12 seconds.

passive.name: Lifesteal
passive.description: Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.

items.name: Diffusal Blade
items.lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.
items.description: Upgradable.

active.name: Purge
active.description: If cast on an enemy, removes buffs from the target and slows it for 4 seconds. Instantly kills enemy summoned units and illusions. If cast on an ally, Purge removes most debuffs.

passive.name: Manabreak
passive.description: Each attack burns 25 mana from the target, and deals the same amount in physical damage. Burns 12 mana per attack from ranged illusions. Does not stack with other manabreak abilities.

items.name: Ethereal Blade
items.lore: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.
items.description: Using a Town Portal Scroll or Boots of Travel will not dispel Ethereal Form.

active.name: Ether Blast
active.description: Launches a projectile which converts the target to ethereal form, increasing any incoming magic damage they take, while rendering them immune to physical damage and unable to attack.  Can be cast on self.  If the target is an enemy, it is also slowed, and takes 2x your primary attribute + 75 as magical damage.

items.name: Soul Ring
items.lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those who wear it.

active.name: Sacrifice
active.description: Consume 150 health to temporarily gain 150 mana.  Lasts 10 seconds.

items.name: Arcane Boots
items.lore: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.
items.description: Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

active.name: Replenish Mana
active.description: Restores mana to all allies in a 900 area around the hero.

items.name: Orb of Venom
items.lore: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.
items.description: Orb of Venom is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.  Orb of Venom can be combined with Lifesteal Attack Modifiers.

passive.name: Poison Attack
passive.description: Poisons the target, dealing damage over time and slowing movement based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

items.name: Stout Shield
items.lore: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.

passive.name: Damage Block
passive.description: Gives a chance to block damage based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

items.name: Drum of Endurance
items.lore: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.
items.description: Multiple instances of Swiftness Aura do not stack.

active.name: Endurance
active.description: Gives bonus +20 attack speed and +10% movement speed to allies in a 900 radius.

passive.name: Swiftness Aura
passive.description: Gives bonus attack and movement speed to allies in a 900 radius.

items.name: Medallion of Courage
items.lore: The bearer has no fear of combat.

active.name: Valor
active.description: If cast on an ally, increases their armor while reducing the caster's. If cast on an enemy, reduces the armor of both the enemy and the caster.  Lasts 7 seconds.

use.description: Upon activation, the user and all nearby allied player-controlled units gain invisibility and bonus movement speed for a brief time.  Minimap icons will also be hidden.  Attacking, or moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, will break the invisibility.

items.name: Veil of Discord
items.lore: The headwear of corrupt magi.

active.name: Magic Weakness
active.description: Emits a weakening blast that increases the magic damage enemies take. Lasts 16 seconds.

items.name: Necronomicon
items.lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

active.name: Demonic Summoning
active.description: Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 40 seconds, whose strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon is upgraded. Warrior gains True Sight at level 3. Upgradable.

items.name: Necronomicon
items.lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

active.name: Demonic Summoning
active.description: Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 40 seconds, whose strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon is upgraded. Warrior gains True Sight at level 3. Upgradable.

items.name: Diffusal Blade
items.lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.
items.description: Upgradable.

active.name: Purge
active.description: If cast on an enemy, removes buffs from the target and slows it for 4 seconds. Instantly kills enemy summoned units and illusions. If cast on an ally, Purge removes most debuffs.

passive.name: Manabreak
passive.description: Each attack burns 25 mana from the target, and deals the same amount in physical damage. Burns 12 mana per attack from ranged illusions. Does not stack with other manabreak abilities.

items.name: Dagon
items.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

active.name: Energy Burst
active.description: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

items.name: Dagon
items.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

active.name: Energy Burst
active.description: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

items.name: Dagon
items.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

active.name: Energy Burst
active.description: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

items.name: Dagon
items.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

active.name: Energy Burst
active.description: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit.

items.name: Rod of Atos
items.lore: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.

active.name: Cripple
active.description: Slows the target's movement speed.

items.name: Abyssal Blade
items.lore: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.

active.name: Overwhelm
active.description: Stuns a target enemy unit for 2 seconds. Pierces Spell Immunity.

passive.name: Bash
passive.description: Grants each attack a chance to stun the target for 1.4 seconds and deal 60 bonus damage, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.

items.name: Heaven's Halberd
items.lore: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.
items.description: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

active.name: Disarm
active.description: Prevents a target from attacking. Lasts 3 seconds on melee targets, and 4.5 seconds on ranged targets.

passive.name: Lesser Maim
passive.description: Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 4 seconds.

items.name: Ring of Aquila
items.lore: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.
items.description: Multiple instances of Aquila Aura do not stack.

active.description: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units.

items.name: Tranquil Boots
items.lore: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.

passive.name: Break
passive.description: Whenever you attack or are attacked, the health regeneration and 30 Movement Speed are lost for 13 seconds.

active.name: Fade
active.description: Grants invisibility to you or a target allied hero after a 1.5 second fade time. Moving breaks the invisibility. There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.

items.name: Enchanted Mango
items.lore: The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.

use.description: Consume the mango to instantly restore 150 mana. Can be fed to an ally.

items.name: Observer and Sentry Wards
items.lore: Advancements in stacking efficiency have made wards easier to carry than ever.

use.description: Plant the currently active ward to keep watch over an area. Observer Wards reveal their surrounding area to your team. Sentry Wards grant True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within its range.

items.name: Boots of Travel 2
items.description: Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

active.name: Teleport
active.description: Teleports you to any allied structure or unit, including heroes. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

items.name: Lotus Orb
items.lore: The jewel at its center still reflects a pale image of its creator.

active.name: Echo Shell
active.description: Applies a shield to the target unit which re-casts most targeted spells back to their caster. The shielded unit will still take damage from the spell. Dispels negative buffs when applied.

items.name: Solar Crest
items.lore: A talisman forged to honor the daytime sky.

active.name: Shine
active.description: Temporarily removes the armor and evasion from Solar Crest. When cast on an ally it grants them 10 armor and 30% evasion. When cast on an enemy it removes 10 of their armor and blinds them, causing them to miss 30% of their attacks.

items.name: Guardian Greaves
items.lore: One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.

active.name: Mend
active.description: Restores 250 health and 160 mana to nearby allies, and removes most negative buffs from the caster.

passive.name: Guardian Aura
passive.description: Provides nearby allies with 4 health regeneration and 2 bonus armor. If an allied hero's health falls below 20%, they receive 15 health regeneration and 15 armor.

items.name: Octarine Core
items.lore: At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.

passive.name: Cooldown Reduction
passive.description: Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 25%.

passive.name: Spell Lifesteal
passive.description: A percentage of damage caused by spells is returned to the caster as health.

items.name: Tango (Shared)
items.lore: Om nom nom.

use.name: Eat a Tree or Ward
use.description: Consume a target tree or ward to gradually restore health.

items.name: Crimson Guard
items.lore: A cuirass originally built to protect against the dreaded Year Beast.

active.name: Guard
active.description: Grant nearby allied heroes a 100% chance to block 55 damage from each incoming attack, along with 2 armor. Lasts 10 seconds.

passive.name: Damage Block
passive.description: Gives the wearer a chance to block damage from each incoming attack based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.

items.name: Moon Shard
items.lore: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.

passive.name: Shade Sight
passive.description: Grants 250 bonus night vision.

items.name: Silver Edge
items.lore: Once used to slay an unjust king, only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.

active.name: Shadow Walk
active.description: Makes you invisible until the duration ends, or until you attack or cast a spell.  While invisible, you move 20% faster and can move through units.  Attacking to end the invisibility will deal 225 bonus damage to the target, disable their passive abilities, and reduce their damage output.

passive.name: Lesser Maim
passive.description: Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 4 seconds.

items.name: Glimmer Cape
items.lore: The stolen cape of a master illusionist.

active.name: Glimmer
active.description: After a 0.4 second delay, grants invisibility and 55% magic resistance to you or a target allied unit. Can be cast while channelling.
